info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern McDowell, west central Caldwell, southeastern Avery and northwestern Burke Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Spruce Pine, or 4 miles north of Table Rock, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morganton, Crossnore, Table Rock, Linville Falls, Lake James, B.R. Parkway-Linville Falls To Grandfather, Lake James State Park, Altamont, Pineola and Ashford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
